entry.title: What's my story?
entry.content: I have spent the last 10 years working for great companies and developing business analytics skills to get valuable, actionable insights from small and big datasets. I'm passionate about data and its added-value to sustainable business improvements, and I have a good fortune to learn and apply analytics in the real world. I frequently placed in the bordering area between business, technology, and quantitative models. This approach is a good way to avoid leaving gaps in the analytical framework, and many of my skills can be applicable across different industries.
